# do not edit manually, instead use spreadsheet https://t.co/f086oJXAEI and script ./core/files/update-translations.sh

cross_front=Take the crossing in front
cross_right=Take the crossing on the right
cross_left=Take the crossing on the left
cross_slight_right=Take the crossing on the slight right
cross_slight_left=Take the crossing on the slight left
cross_sharp_right=Take the crossing on the sharp right
cross_sharp_left=Take the crossing on the sharp left
exit_cross_front=Exit the crossing and continue in front
exit_cross_right=Exit the crossing and turn right
exit_cross_left=Exit the crossing and turn left
exit_cross_slight_right=Exit the crossing and turn slight right
exit_cross_slight_left=Exit the crossing and turn slight left
exit_cross_sharp_right=Exit the crossing and turn sharp right
exit_cross_sharp_left=Exit the crossing and turn sharp left

unmarked_cross_front=Cross the road in front
unmarked_cross_right=Cross the road on the right
unmarked_cross_left=Cross the road on the left
unmarked_cross_slight_right=Cross the road on the slight right
unmarked_cross_slight_left=Cross the road on the slight left
unmarked_cross_sharp_right=Cross the road on the sharp right
unmarked_cross_sharp_left=Cross the road on the sharp left
exit_unmarked_cross_front=After crossing the road, continue in front
exit_unmarked_cross_right=After crossing the road, turn right
exit_unmarked_cross_left=After crossing the road, turn left
exit_unmarked_cross_slight_right=After crossing the road, turn slight right
exit_unmarked_cross_slight_left=After crossing the road, turn slight left
exit_unmarked_cross_sharp_right=After crossing the road, turn sharp right
exit_unmarked_cross_sharp_left=After crossing the road, turn sharp left

steps_front=Take the stairs in front
steps_right=Take the stairs on the right
steps_left=Take the stairs on the left
steps_slight_right=Take the stairs on the slight right
steps_slight_left=Take the stairs on the slight left
steps_sharp_right=Take the stairs on the sharp right
steps_sharp_left=Take the stairs on the sharp left

exit_steps_right=Exit the stairs and turn right
exit_steps_left=Exit the stairs and turn left
exit_steps_slight_right=Exit the stairs and turn slight right
exit_steps_slight_left=Exit the stairs and turn slight left
exit_steps_sharp_right=Exit the stairs and turn sharp right
exit_steps_sharp_left=Exit the stairs and turn sharp left

continue=continue
continue_onto=continue onto %1$s

pt_end_trip=leave %1$s

web.end_label=End
